it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters

Class HostEndsWith

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters.AbstractFilter<URI>
      • it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters.HostEndsWith
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Predicate<URI>, Filter<URI>, FlyweightPrototype<Filter<URI>>

    public class HostEndsWith
extends AbstractFilter<URI>
    A filter accepting only URIs whose host ends with (case-insensitively) a certain suffix.

    Note that apply(URI) will throw an IllegalArgumentException if the argument has a null host.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters.Filter
